t: Amazon Box Sizes - List of Amazon Box Dimensions
s: November 2, 2018 - If you sell on Amazon, you probably reuse their boxes. Entering the dimensions of the box while filling out a shipment order is one of the parts of the process that always takes me more time than it should. I created this site so that anyone else who is trying to figure out the size of the boxes without measuring the box themselves can do so with ease. While entering the box dimensions, note that it is Length ...

t: Item missing/damaged from Amazon order? Steps to quickly contact support to get a replacement
s: October 18, 2020 - I ordered few items from Amazon.com last week and when the package is delivered I found an item is missing. I reached out to Amazon Customer care and they resolved the issue by resending the missing item.

t: Find a Missing Item from Your Amazon Order - Amazon Customer Service
s: If your order was shipped by Amazon and you receive an empty shipping package, contact our Customer Service within 30 days of expected delivery. We'll do everything we can to help.

t: r/UPS on Reddit: Amazon return "no box or label needed"
One in two Amazon shipments in Europe are delivered without a box, thanks to packaging reduction innovation
s: February 4, 2025 - More than 50% of Amazon’s European shipments now come in reduced, recyclable delivery packaging, such as a paper bag or cardboard envelope or – in the case of 1 billion shipments since 2019 – no added packaging at all.

t: Amazon offers free returns with no box, tape, or label needed
s: December 23, 2024 - There are many ways Amazon will help get your return off your hands for free, including drop-off options at Staples, Whole Foods Market, and Kohl’s locations.

t: Amazon Buy Box (now called Featured Offer) FAQs

t: Return Items You Ordered - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can return many eligible items sold on Amazon.com. When you return an item, you may see different return options depending on the seller, item, or reason for return.
